title: Add production tags for OptProf CI
body:
Adding Production tags for OptProf CI pipeline to force pipeline to pick the build/commits marked as 'production' for improved reliability.

## Fixes
Existing optprof failures.
Inspired by @mtylerMSFT work for VS.

commit.message:
Add production tags for OptProf CI

Adding Production tags for OptProf CI pipeline to force pipeline to pick the build/commits marked as 'production' for improved reliability.

nodes.body: @YuliiaKovalova is such tagging already happening somewhere in our automation? Or will it be part of some manual checklist?

> @YuliiaKovalova is such tagging already happening somewhere in our automation? Or will it be part of some manual checklist?

this tagging was added to avoid picking up changes to DartLab.OptProf that is still being tested.
See email thread "OptPorf failures due to telemetry script ".
I don't think we need to remove the tags.
